archimate:ServiceJourney.name: Service Journey
archimate:ServiceJourney.documentation: A Service Journey is a specialised process that we use to document the behaviour the service itself needs to provide in order to support a customer journey. The Service Journey will include interactions, activities/journeys and functions that describe each element that contributes to the overall behaviour. This is used to drive out the details of what the behaviour means and what it comsists of to ensure it is addressed in the most effective way. Each Jourey Element contained in the journey should have its characteristics completed.
